D\) Content & Microcopy Guidelines

People vs Places: always say "Studio" for spaces; never "venue" at
launch.

Badges: keep labels short: "Verified", "Trusted Pro", "Verified Studio",
"Instant Book", "Promoted".

Policies: use plain language ("Cancel by 7 days for full refund").

Safety: avoid alarmist tones; be clear ("House rules apply; cameras must
be disclosed").

Email/push: never show 18+ previews; SFW copy only.

E\) Accessibility & Error Patterns

AA Contrast for all text & icons; verify with tooling in CI.

Keyboard & Screen Readers: focus trap in modals, labeled inputs, ARIA on
tabs/drawers, logical heading order.

Hit targets: 44×44 px minimum.

Errors: inline + summary; link to KB where relevant; keep technical
jargon out of user copy.

F\) Performance & Media Guidelines

Images: lazyload, responsive srcset, WebP/AVIF where supported; max card
image \~120--200KB.

Video: autogenerate lightweight proxies (muted, no autoplay on mobile);
never embed heavy originals.

Icons: sprite or treeshaken; defer OAuth SDKs until user opens Social
Connect.

Skeletons: render within 100ms to reduce perceived latency.

G\) Telemetry (componentlevel events)

card.click (type=person\|studio, promoted=true\|false)

chip.click (type=verified\|trusted\|studio\|instantbook\|social)

filters.open/apply/reset, saved_search.create/toggle

attach_studio.open/select, lbg.summary.expand

doc.sign/open, delivery.accept/request_revision

boost.create/pause, featured.purchase

verification.start/complete (step), social.connect

calendar.block/ib_window, reschedule.propose/accept

checkout.pay.success/fail

H\) Acceptance Criteria (mark 4.2 FINAL)

Foundations (tokens, type, spacing, breakpoints, motion) defined and
consumable.

Core components delivered: PersonCard, StudioCard, BoardCard,
CaseStudyCard, SkeletonCard.

Chips & badges for Verified, Trusted Pro, Verified Studio, Instant Book,
Social metrics, Promoted.

Search patterns: SearchBar, FilterDrawer (people + studio), Saved
Search, ANY/ALL social logic, Verifiedonly toggle.

Modals/Drawers implemented: Quick Brief, Attach a Studio, Quick Quote,
Change Order, PostBooking Adjustment, Damage Claim, Reschedule, Review
Composer, Safe Mode Toggle, Payment Method, OAuth Connect.

Delivery Room & Smart Docs components complete and reused in all flows.

Reputation & Reviews components wired to ranking tiebreaks and profile
displays.

Verification Center components (ID, BG, Social, Studio Lite) with unlock
blurbs.

Calendars, Checkout, Notifications/Toasts, Admin split views ready;
deposit actions supported.

Accessibility (AA) & performance budgets enforced; telemetry events
instrumented.

I\) Why this works

Consistency → speed: One library powers all surfaces---less time
prototyping, more time validating.

Clarity of types: People vs Places appear distinct (but complementary)
across cards, filters, and checkout.

Safety & fairness are visible: Badges, verified chips, Promoted labels,
and policy snippets make trust legible and ads honest.

Mobilefirst: Drawers, sticky bars, and concise cards keep flows fast on
phones.

§4.3 --- Auth & Onboarding Flows

Goal: Move new users from "curious" → first meaningful action fast, with
minimal friction and role/space awareness. Keep Safe Mode ON by default,
defer heavier checks (ID, Background, Studio Lite) until they unlock
value (Instant Book, badges, DM credits), and support multirole + studio
under one account.

A\) Principles

Fast path first: Light signin, ask current city, and immediately route
to a next action (Search, Quick Brief, Quick Package, or New Studio).

One account → many offerings: Users can create Service Profiles (roles)
and Studio Listings (spaces) under a single login.

Progressive verification: Verification is optional at first, but clearly
rewards users (Instant Book, DM credit boosts, badges, Early Payout
eligibility).

Safe by default: Safe Mode ON; FanSubscription Creator is agegated;
minors operate via guardian/agency (Phase 2).

Save & resume: All wizards autosave; deep links return to the exact
step.

Measure activation: Instrument "timetofirst": Saved Search / Quick Brief
/ Package publish / Studio publish.

B\) Auth (signup / signin)

Entry points

Header Sign in / Create account, plus intercepts on Book, Message,
Create actions.

Deep links preserve return URL.

Methods

Email passcode / magic link

Apple (native/app + web)

Google (web)

Phone SMS (optional; recommended for providers/hosts to unlock extra DM
credits)

First capture (all users)

Display name (public alias allowed; legal name later for payouts)

City (typeahead; defaults from IP) & Timezone

Safe Mode = ON (explain; can toggle later)

Intent chips (choose any; sets next route):

Book talent / studios (buyer path)

List my services (seller path)

List my studio (host path)

Age & policy gates

To create a FanSubscription Creator profile or toggle Safe Mode OFF,
user confirms 18+ (timestamped).

Launch policy: Accounts are 18+; minors only via guardian/agencymanaged
accounts (Phase 2). Studio media must be SFW.

C\) Buyer Onboarding (Bookers/Brands)

1\) Welcome choices (one tap):

Start a Quick Brief (30--60s)

Search now (roleselector preset to current city)

Save a Search template (e.g., "Models in Houston this weekend")

2\) Quick Brief (drawer):

Role, city, date/time, budget, deliverables, Attach Studio toggle

Send Smart Invites (top matches) or Broadcast RFP (credits)

Creates a Buyer Dashboard tile for the brief

3\) Saved Search helper:

Offer 2--3 presets by role; daily alerts ON by default (user can adjust
cadence)

Buyer activation (success state):

Completed Quick Brief or saved first search or sent ≥1 Smart Invite.

D\) Seller Onboarding (Service Profiles: Model / Photographer /
Videographer / Creator / FanSub Creator)

Entry: "List my services" → Role picker (multiselect allowed; wizard
runs per role)

Wizard (per role)

Essentials

Display name (public), city, travel radius; portfolio starter (3--6
images; +1 video for video roles)

Models/Creators: look & comfort fields (height, hair, measurements,
Nudity tier), chaperone policy

Photographers/Videographers: specialties, deliverables, turnaround

FanSub Creators: platform links, promo offerings, posting
windows/minlive acknowledgement

Packages & Pricing

Choose a template (e.g., "2hr portrait", "Halfday shoot", "UGC promo")

Set price, addons, licensing tiers, travel fee logic (radius + permile
or zone)

Instant Book toggle (locked until ID verified; show what it unlocks)

Availability

Calendar connect (ICS), IB windows & buffers; touring dates

Verification (optional now, highvalue)

ID Verify → Instant Book + +20 DM credits

Background Check → Trusted Pro badge + reliability nudge + +20 DM
credits

Connect Social (IG/YT/TT/X) → verified chips & engagement metrics in
search

Review & Publish

Preview → Publish (searchable) → persistent checklist

Postpublish checklist (owner ribbon)

✅ Publish first package

✅ Add 6+ portfolio items

🔓 Verify ID (unlock IB + DM credits)

🔓 Connect socials (show verified metrics)

➕ Create a case study

Seller activation:

Published ≥1 package or sent first Quick Quote.

E\) Host Onboarding (Studio Listings)

Entry: "List my studio" → Create Studio Listing (wizard)

Wizard (studio)

Basics: title, neighborhood (exact address hidden), capacity, size,
ceiling height

Photos: gallery (min 6), suggested shot list (front, cyc, makeup,
loadin, bathrooms)

Amenities: natural light, cyc (size), blackout, makeup/dressing,
grip/lighting, soundtreated, parking/loadin, A/C

Rules: noise, shoes, pets, food, surveillance disclosure, crew limits,
hazards (strobe/haze/open flame/ladder)

Pricing & Schedule: \$/hr, min hours, cleaning fee, Instant Book on/off,
hourly slots, buffers

Deposits & Docs: optional damage deposit hold, House Rules,
Property/Space Release (Smart Docs)

Verification Lite: upload lease/utility/business doc → OCR + geocode
match

Review & Publish

Postpublish checklist (host)

✅ Add availability slots

🔓 Pass Studio Lite (shows Verified Studio badge; IB guardrail if
required)

➕ Link to your People profile (if applicable)

➕ Create a case study featuring the space

Host activation:

Published studio or accepted first booking.

F\) MultiRole & Linking Flows

Add another role: After finishing one, prompt to add others (e.g., model
who also shoots).

Link a studio: From a People profile, Link Studio → select owned Studio
→ profile shows "Has Studio" chip; Studio detail shows Host card linking
back.

Context switch: Profile switcher in Account menu (desktop) / segmented
control on Profile (mobile).

G\) Verification Center (progressive, valuetied)

ID Verification → unlock Instant Book (people) + +20 DM credits

Background Check (Trusted Pro) → badge + +20 DM credits (people)

Social Connect → verified metrics chips & social engagement filters

Studio Lite → Verified Studio badge; enables IB guardrail if policy
requires

Early Payout eligibility (peruse fee) → for highrep accounts (Rep ≥ 85)

UX: Each step shows "What you unlock", typical duration, and success
rates.

H\) Safe Mode & FanSubscription Creator Gating

Safe Mode toggle in header during onboarding (explain what's hidden);
default ON.

To create FanSubscription Creator: confirm 18+ and accept policy; public
media SFW; promo deliverables respect minlive rules (see §3.5).

I\) FirstRun Experiences (nudges)

Seller

"Get your first 5 leads": Save a search for buyers, post a case study,
enable IB, connect social, set touring dates.

Pricefit hints vs city median; responsetime hint.

Host

"Improve discoverability": add amenity tags, clarify rules, pass Studio
Lite, upload day/night light examples.

Buyer

"Speed up booking": save searches, reuse briefs, attach a studio in
checkout, invite shortlisted talent.

J\) Edge Cases & Safeguards

Abandoned wizards autosave and email/push resume links.

Duplicate detection (People/Studios): softmatch (name/phone/city);
claim/merge flow.

Name privacy: public alias allowed; legal name used only for
payouts/verification.

Content policy: portfolio uploader enforces artisticonly; SafeModeaware
previews.

Accessibility: wizards are keyboardable, show step counts, and preserve
focus on validation errors.

Fraud gates: new accounts may have payout reserves (per §3.1).

K\) Metrics (per city, first 90 days)

Auth → first action conversion ≥ 65%

Buyer activation (Quick Brief or Saved Search) ≥ 60%

Seller activation (Package publish or Quick Quote) ≥ 55%

Host activation (Studio publish) ≥ 35%

Timetofirst inquiry median: ≤ 3 days (seller), ≤ 7 days (host)

Verification adoption by day 30: ID ≥ 60% (active sellers), Studio Lite
≥ 50% (active hosts)

Step dropoff \< 20% at any wizard step

L\) Acceptance Criteria (mark 4.3 FINAL)

Auth supports Email/Apple/Google (+ optional SMS), return URLs, city
capture, Safe Mode default ON, and intent routing (buyer/seller/host).

Buyer onboarding provides Quick Brief, Search, and Saved Search; Smart
Invites/Broadcast RFP work from Quick Brief.

Seller wizard (per role) collects essentials, packages, availability;
exposes IB/verification unlocks; publishes searchable profiles.

Host wizard collects amenities, rules, pricing, schedule; supports
deposit holds; Studio Lite step; publishes studios.

Linking: People ↔ owned Studio chip; host card on studio detail.

Verification Center: ID, Background, Social, Studio Lite with explicit
unlocks and progress.

Safe Mode & FanSub gating enforced during onboarding; SFW previews on
public surfaces.

Save & resume and duplicate detection implemented; alias vs legal name
handled.

Activation metrics instrumented and visible in city rollout dashboards.

M\) Why this works

Fast to value: Buyers can send invites within a minute; sellers can
publish a bookable package in one sitting; hosts can list a studio with
clear expectations.

Low friction, high trust: Heavy checks are optional but clearly
rewarding (IB, DM credits, badges, Early Payout).

One account, many hats: Multirole + studio is natural, with simple
linking and context switching.

Measurable & tunable: Activation KPIs let us iterate quickly citybycity.

§4.4 --- Role Profiles (Public & Owner Views)

Goal: Make every role profile a hightrust, bookable storefront that's
easy to scan, easy to compare, and easy to manage---while keeping People
vs Places distinct, Safe Mode ON by default, and rolescoped reviews &
reputation. Support multirole accounts and optional studio linking
cleanly.

A\) Routes & Ownership

Public view (role): /{role}/{slug}\
Roles: model, photographer, videographer, creator, fan-creator (18+
gated)

Owner edit: /seller/profile/{role} (single editor per role; no public
/edit route)

Linked studio: public studio detail lives at /studio/{slug}; crosslinked
chips (see §4.1).

B\) Profile Layout (public)

1\) Header

Avatar • Display name (alias allowed) • Role badge • City/Radius •
Reputation ring (0--100) with "Why this score?"

Chips: Verified (ID), Trusted Pro (BG), Instant Book (if enabled),
Has/Owns Studio (links to studio), Social metric chips (IG/YT/TT/X with
verified badge & ER/avg views), Responsetime chip ("Replies in \~1h")

Primary CTAs: Message, Instant Book / Request to Book, Add to Board,
Share

Sticky action bar on mobile: Book/Request

2\) Tabs

Portfolio (default) • Packages • About • Reviews • Updates (feed) •
Policies & FAQs

FanSubscription Creator appears only when Safe Mode OFF (tab hidden
otherwise)

3\) Right rail (desktop) / Inline blocks (mobile)

Availability calendar (IB windows & touring)

Quick facts (rolespecific fields)

Linked Studio module (if any)

Case Studies featuring this profile

C\) RoleSpecific Content (what each tab shows)

1\) Portfolio (all roles)

Curated galleries: images (grid, 3:2 default) + video tiles; SFW
previews only (artisticonly policy).

Sets (optional): group by theme (e.g., Beauty, Editorial, Fitness), each
with cover image.

Tagging: collaborators can tag this user; owner must approve before it
appears. Owner can untag or hide tagged content.

Credits: autopull tagged collaborators; tap to open their profiles;
helps network effects.

Safe Mode behavior: if any set contains imagery beyond "Lingerie/Swim"
aesthetic, set is hidden unless Safe Mode OFF (but previews remain SFW).

2\) Packages (bookable offerings)

Card list of packages & addons with inclusions, price, duration,
location policy, licensing presets.

Studio AddOn row appears for photographers who linked a studio (hourly +
min hours; adds in checkout as separate Studio booking inside LBG).

Instant Book badge per package if enabled.

Availability selector → Book/Request flows (per §1.3).

3\) About (rolespecific fields)

Model / Creator quick facts: height, measurements, hair, eyes, skin
tone, tattoos/piercings (Y/N), shoe/dress sizes; Comfort levels: genres
(fashion, fitness, lingerie/swim, artistic nude yes/no), chaperone
policy, travel radius; languages.

Photographer: specialties (portrait, editorial, product, beauty,
events), deliverables (edits count), turnaround SLA, licensing tiers,
team size (if any), travel policy. (Gear is optional, deprioritized.)

Videographer: specialties (talkinghead, shortform, product),
deliverables (length/resolution), color/sound/post options, drone
license (Y/N), music licensing policy.

FanSubscription Creator (18+ gated): supported platforms (OnlyFans,
Fansly, Patreon), promo deliverables (e.g., story frames, feed posts,
duet/stitch), posting windows & minlive (from §3.5), whitelisting/usage
rules (brand usage, duration).

Socials: verified connections (IG/YT/TT/X) + icons; follower and ER/avg
views chips; linkonly platforms marked Unverified.

Languages, travel & touring cities upcoming (optional calendar).

4\) Reviews

Verified booking reviews (rolescoped) at top; Community references below
(lower weight).

Sort: Most recent • Highest • Lowest.

Review breakdown with charts (quality, professionalism, reliability).

Owner responses allowed (single reply per review).

Reputation "Why" panel: contribution bars (reviews/volume 40%,
reliability 25%, responsiveness 10%, verifications 15%, recent 10%;
penalties decay).

5\) Updates (profile posts/feed)

Short posts, WIP photos, behindthescenes (SFW).

Followers see these posts in their Home feed; Follow count visible on
profile.

Pinned update supported (one per role).

Tag collaborators; approvals required as with Portfolio.

6\) Policies & FAQs

Cancellation (role's matrix summary), Reschedule, Deliverables &
revisions, Travel fees, Chaperone, Boundaries & comfort, Safety tips.

Links to KB for deeper policy detail.

D\) Booking & Messaging Entry Points (from profile)

Primary CTA: Instant Book (if IDverified & enabled) or Request to Book
(approval flow).

Secondary CTA: Message (thread; prefilled context from the package or
profile).

Add to Board: saves card to a shortlist board.

Attach a Studio: appears in checkout, not on profile; profiles with a
linked studio show Has Studio chip linking to the studio page.

E\) Owner View (editor) per Role

Editor shell: /seller/profile/{role} with tabs matching public:
Portfolio, Packages, About, Reviews, Updates, Policies, Analytics

Portfolio (owner)

Dragreorder; set covers; set privacy; approve/decline tags; watermark
toggle; alttext fields; SafeMode warnings for borderline content.

Packages & Addons

Create/edit packages (templates), addons, license presets; Instant Book
toggle (gated by ID), Travel fee config (zone/mi).

About

Role fields editor; nudity tier toggle (artistic nude Y/N for
models/creators); chaperone policy; languages; touring schedule.

Availability

Calendar (IB windows/buffers), ICS sync, touring cities; block dates.

Policies

Perrole micropolicies (cancellation windows, reschedule rules within
platform bands), deliverables SLA, revision rounds.

Updates

Compose posts (text + image/video), tag collaborators, pin/unpin; post
scheduler (optional).

Reviews

Readonly list + reply; request a Community reference link (offplatform
collaborator may submit; owner approves).

Analytics (per role)

Profile views, search appearances, top queries that matched you,
conversion funnel (view → message → booking), pricefit vs city median,
responsetime impact, social growth (if connected), Rep score breakdown.

Verification nudges

Inline cards: "Verify ID to unlock Instant Book", "Pass Background to
earn Trusted Pro", "Connect socials to show metrics".

Link a Studio

If account owns a studio listing: link/unlink; Studio AddOn toggle for
packages (hourly + min hours).

F\) Data, Reviews & Reputation (rolescoped)

Reviews & Rep are scoped to the role being viewed; profiles show that
role's score; a mini "Also operates as ..." band links to other roles
with their score badges.

Community references labeled and weighted lower than Verified booking
reviews.

Fraud guards: multiple reviews from same buyer throttle; unusual review
bursts flagged.

G\) Safety, Privacy & Compliance (profile level)

Artisticonly media enforced in uploader; SafeMode previews only in
public/feeds.

No external contact leaks: public profile hides emails/phones; outbound
links limited to verified social icons and case studies.

Chaperone policy visible on Model/Creator profiles; harassment reporting
from the profile.

Minor participation: Phase2 via guardian/agency only; profiles must be
18+ at launch.

Report profile modal covers misrepresentation, unsafe behavior, policy
violations.

H\) MultiRole UX

Public profile shows role tabs (if user operates multiple).

Start on the role that matched the entry (from search).

Tab switch shows rolespecific packages, reviews, rep, and fields; keeps
Message / Book CTAs contextual to the active role.

Header chips persist (Verified, Trusted Pro) per role; socials are
shared.

I\) Performance & Accessibility

Lazyload media; responsive srcset; AVIF/WebP where available; alttext
required.

Tab ARIA roles; keyboardable galleries; captions for videos;
highcontrast compliance.

Skeletons for header & package list; TTI target \<2.5s on 3G Fast.

J\) Telemetry (events)

profile.view (role) • cta.click.book \| cta.click.message • board.add

portfolio.tag.approve/decline • package.book.start/complete •
instant_book.toggle

social.verified_chip.view • rep.why.open • studio.link.click

update.post • follow.click • review.submit/respond

analytics.view (owner) • price_fit.hint.view/action

K\) Acceptance Criteria (mark 4.4 FINAL)

Public role profiles render with Header, Tabs (Portfolio, Packages,
About, Reviews, Updates, Policies), rightrail modules, and sticky
Book/Request on mobile.

Rolespecific fields display correctly and are editable in the owner
editor; nudity tier/chaperone policies for Models/Creators present.

Packages are bookable; Instant Book shows when enabled; Studio AddOn
appears for linked studios and adds to checkout as LBG.

Social metric chips render only when verified connections exist;
unverified links labeled clearly.

Reviews show verifiedbooking first; community references labeled; owner
can reply once; Rep "Why" panel works.

Updates feed posts publish to profile and follower feeds; Follow count
displays.

Tagging & approvals for portfolio items work; collaborator links open
profiles.

Safe Mode hides FanSubscription Creator role & any beyondLingerie sets
unless OFF; all media remains SFW on public surfaces.

Owner editor provides Portfolio, Packages, About, Availability,
Policies, Updates, Reviews, Analytics, Link a Studio, and Verification
nudges.

Telemetry events fire as listed; performance & accessibility targets
met.

L\) Why this works

Bookable storefronts: Every role's page converts (clear packages,
availability, and CTAs).

Signalrich but simple: Badges, social chips, and a transparent Rep score
reduce risk without clutter.

Multirole clarity: Each role stands on its own merit; switching is
explicit; reviews/reputation never mix.

Network effects: Tagging, case studies, and follows tie profiles
together, lifting discovery and retention.

§4.5 --- Studio Listing (Public & Host Views)

Goal: Make studios a clean, trustworthy, creativeready space type that
buyers can book in minutes or attach to a talent checkout---without
turning the product into a venue marketplace. Keep policies, payouts,
reviews, and reputation spacescoped and separate from people roles.

A\) Routes & Ownership

Public Hub: /studios?city={city} (grid + optional map; amenity filters).

Public Detail: /studio/{slug} (space page).

Host Create/Edit: /studio/new, /studio/{slug}/edit.

Host Dashboard: /studio/{slug}/dashboard (calendar, bookings, rules,
deposits/claims).

Host Bookings: /studio/{slug}/bookings (list + detail).

Linking: Accounts can link their own Studio to their People profiles
(shows Has/Owns Studio chip on role profile; Host card on studio page).

B\) Public Studio Detail --- Layout & Content

Header (above the fold)

Title (descriptive; e.g., "Downtown Loft w/ Natural Light & White Cyc")

Neighborhood (exact address hidden until booking) • Price/hr • Min hours
• Capacity

Badges: Verified Studio (if passed Studio Lite), Instant Book (if
enabled)

N\) Why this works

Clear separation: Studios behave like spaces with their own rules,
deposits, and reviews---no confusion with people roles.

§4.6 --- Search & Results (Roleaware + Studios)

Goal: Make search fast, fair, and creatorspecific. Keep People (roles)
and Places (Studios) distinct but easy to combine. Surface the right
filters for each role, enable perplatform social targeting, and support
AttachinFlow so buyers can add a Studio to a talent checkout in one
pass.

A\) Entry Points & Routes

(grid + optional map).

city/date/time.

Saved Search links open the same route with filters applied.

Safe Mode is ON by default and gates People results that exceed
"Lingerie/Swim"; Studios are not gated (SFW media only).

§4.7 --- Checkout & Linked Booking Group

Goal: Make paying predictable, transparent, and safe for both Talent and
Studio bookings---whether purchased alone or together. Treat Talent and
Studio as separate bookings with independent policies & payouts, but
present a single, simple checkout and one receipt when bought together
via an LBG. Minimize dropoff with clear fees, policy previews, and fast
payment flows (Card, ACH).

A\) Entry Points & Routes

From People profile (Packages): Book / Request to Book →
/checkout/talent/{tempId}

From Studio page: Instant Book / Request → /checkout/studio/{tempId}

From Brief/Compare: Award → /checkout/talent/{tempId} (prefilled)

AttachinFlow (talent checkout): adds a Studio →
/checkout/group/{groupId}

Linked Group summary (always when 2 bookings present):
/checkout/group/{groupId}

B\) Checkout Structure (single vs group)

Singlebooking Checkout (Talent or Studio)

Details (date/time/duration, package or hourly calc)

Docs (Smart Docs pack)

Payment (card/ACH)

Confirm

Linked Booking Group (Talent + Studio)

Group header with two panels: Talent \| Studio (expand/collapse)

Steps: Review → Docs → Payment → Confirm

Policies & totals displayed per booking, with a group total at bottom.

Atomicity: The LBG confirms only if both bookings succeed
(payments/holds). If one fails, the user sees options to retry, edit, or
remove the failing item.

C\) Details Step

Talent panel

Package chosen, addons, price; travel fee calc (zone or permile beyond
included radius), schedule, location (approx).

Instant Book chip if applicable; otherwise "Request to Book" label with
expected response window.

Studio panel

Date/time & min hours check; hourly calc + cleaning fee (if set);
deposit hold badge with amount; rules summary.

Conflicts & validation

Live revalidation of availability for both panels before continuing.

If collision or minhours violation, inline error + suggested
alternatives (nearby time slots, similar studios).

Group time sync enforced: studio duration must cover talent time (+
configured buffer).

D\) Smart Docs Step (esign before pay)

Autoassembled packs (prefilled from booking context):

Talent: SOW, License, Model Release (if needed), Cancellation policy
summary.

Studio: Property/Space Release, House Rules, Safety Addendum
(autoincluded if hazards toggled), Studio cancellation terms.

Esign required to proceed (oneclick signer sheet per doc; audit trail
stored).

Amendments: if details change later (reschedule/adjustments), amended
docs generate automatically and require reack.

Address privacy: Studio's exact address unlocks after confirmation;
shown in thread + ics attachments.

E\) Payment Step

Methods

Card (3DS/SCA when required)

ACH (Plaidlike link) → buyer fee reduced to 3% (min \$3) when enabled;
may have delayed confirmation.

Apple Pay / Google Pay (Phase 2) where supported.

What's charged

Talent: full booking subtotal into escrow (per §1.3).

Studio: full studio subtotal into escrow + deposit hold authorization
(not charged) per listing configuration.

Buyer service fee per booking (5% card / 3% ACH when enabled).

Taxes (if applicable) itemized per booking.

Atomic capture for LBG

Attempt charges/holds in a safe order (e.g., Talent escrow → Studio
escrow → Studio deposit hold).

If any step fails → no booking confirms; guide user to retry or remove
problem item.

Promos & discounts

City promos autoapply (e.g., founding city 0% buyer fee).

Provider fee discounts (IB --1%, Trusted Pro --0.5%) affect provider
payout, not buyer total; shown as "Provider earns more with Instant
Book" tooltip.

Fee transparency

Inline "What do platform fees cover?" tooltip: escrow, contracts,
support, processing.

F\) Confirm Step

Success page shows two booking tiles (Talent • Studio) with: status,
dates, "Open thread," "Add to calendar," "View Docs," "Share itinerary."

Deposit hold line (Studio): clearly states authorization amount &
automatic release window (e.g., 48h postcheckout if no claim).

Trusted contact prompt (optional safety feature): share generalarea
location & times during the session.

Next actions:

Buyer: "Message" / "Request reschedule" / "Add notes for shoot"

Seller/Host: "Review details" / "Send prep notes" / "Share access code"
(studio)

G\) Pricing & Calculations (display rules)

Per booking (panel & receipt lines):

Subtotal (Talent: package + addons + travel; Studio: hours×rate +
cleaning + approved addons)

Buyer fee (5% card / 3% ACH when enabled; min \$3; nonrefundable on
buyer cancels per policy)

Estimated taxes (if applicable)

Deposit hold (Studio only; authorization)

Total charged now (escrow amounts)

Group total shown at bottom in LBG; collapsible breakdown.

H\) Edits & Reschedules (pre/postconfirmation)

Before confirmation

Edit time, add/remove addons; LBG validates both bookings.

Changing Talent time proposes Studio shift (and viceversa); if not
possible, show split option or alternatives.

After confirmation (flows in thread, per §1.3 addendum)

Propose reschedule to both bookings in LBG; new times quoted &
reauthorized if totals change.

Split LBG if only one party can accommodate change (buyer chooses);
refunds per respective matrices.

Change orders (Talent) & duration changes (Studio) recalc totals;
amended docs issued.

I\) Cancellations & Refund Preview

Inline policy previews on each panel with "Learn more" to KB.

Cancellation modal shows computed outcomes per booking (e.g., "Talent:
50% refund • Studio: 0% refund") and a group summary.

Host/Sellerfault cancels: autorefunds buyer fee for that booking;
goodwill credits as configured (§3.9).

J\) Receipts & Calendar

Unified receipt with two sections (Talent • Studio), fees, taxes, and
deposit authorization line (Studio).

ICS invites per booking; Linked Group itinerary (combined) downloadable.

Tax docs stored per booking (not shown at checkout).

K\) Error Handling & Edge Cases

Payment declined / 3DS fail: stay on Payment step; show reason; allow
method switch.

Deposit hold fail (Studio): surface amount & bank advice; offer to
remove Studio or retry.

Doublebooking race: if availability disappears between Details and Pay,
show conflict modal with alternatives.

Early exit policy note (Studio): no prorata refunds unless host agrees;
checkout governs overtime only.

No rideshare integration at v1: travel is seller configurable; buyers
may arrange transport independently.

L\) Accessibility, Performance & Privacy

Accessibility: logical heading order; labeled inputs; ARIA for steppers
and docs list; keyboardable signature.

Performance: TTI \< 2.5s; defer SDKs (ACH/OAuth/3DS) until opened;
skeletons for panels; cache price calcs clientside.

Privacy: exact studio address hidden until confirm; only general area
shown prior; emails/push never contain 18+ previews.

checkout.open (type=talent\|studio\|group)

checkout.validate.ok/fail (reason=availability\|min_hours\|conflict)

docs.sign (doc type) • docs.amend.issued/accepted

payment.method.select (card\|ach) • payment.attempt.success/fail
(reason)

deposit.authorize.success/fail (amount)

checkout.confirm.success (single\|group)

promo.apply (city_promo\|code)

fee.tooltip.view (engagement proxy)

N\) Acceptance Criteria (mark 4.7 FINAL)

Single & group checkouts implemented with steppers, perbooking panels,
and a group total for LBG.

Smart Docs packs (Talent: SOW/License/Release; Studio: Property/Space
Release + House Rules + Safety Addendum) are esigned before payment;
amended docs reissued on changes.

Payment supports Card and ACH (ACH reduces buyer fee to 3% when
enabled); handles 3DS; logs outcomes.

Escrow collected per booking; Studio deposit hold authorized (not GMV).

Atomic LBG: both bookings must succeed or none confirm; failure guidance
provided.

Policies & refunds previewed per booking; cancellation modal computes
outcomes; receipts show split lines and deposit authorization.

Reschedule & change order flows are LBGaware (sync or split), with
reauth when totals change.

Travel fees (Talent) calculated from role settings (zones/mi beyond
included radius).

Accessibility, performance, privacy baselines met; telemetry events
fire.

O\) Why this works

Confidence to commit: Contracts signed before money moves; fees and
policies are crystalclear.

Simple for buyers, correct for finance: One checkout & receipt---even
for two bookings---while ledgers stay separate.

Fewer support tickets: Evidencefirst docs, deposit holds, and policy
previews reduce disputes.

Launchready: Card + ACH, IB + Request, and AttachinFlow cover the common
paths without building a full billing platform.

§4.8 --- Delivery Room & Acceptance

Goal: Provide a storagesane, evidencefirst workspace for handing off
creative work, managing proofs → selects → finals, verifying promo/UGC
deliverables, and closing out bookings with clear acceptance timers that
trigger payouts and reduce disputes.

A\) Routes & Ownership

Buyer view: /booking/{id}/delivery (read/approve/request revisions).

Seller view: /booking/{id}/delivery (author/publish/revise).

Studio bookings: show readonly timeline (checkin/out, docs); no Delivery
Room (studios don't deliver files).

Linked Booking Group: each booking has its own Delivery Room; LBG
summary links to each.

B\) Concepts & Stages

Manifest --- authoritative list of deliverables (filenames/links +
checksums, size, type, version).

Proofs --- lowres watermarked images / lowbitrate proxies for video; no
originals on platform.

Selects --- buyer picks which proofs should be finalized (if package
includes selection).

Finals --- fullspec outputs referenced via external links
(Drive/Dropbox/OneDrive/S3) + optional onplatform proxy; license applies
on acceptance.

UGC/Promo --- a verified post on IG/YT/TT/X with link and API check +
required minlive window.

Storagesane principle: We host previews/proxies only; originals stay at
the source. We capture a manifest and verify integrity (hash), so
disputes can be adjudicated without hosting 100GB+ assets.

C\) Typical Workflow

Prepare & Upload Proofs (seller)

Create a Delivery batch → add Proofs (images/videos) with auto
watermark/proxy.

Add External Links (optional) for previewing higher quality; platform
immediately stores manifest metadata (name, ext, size, checksum,
provider, URL).

Autochecks (see §F) run and annotate items.

Buyer Reviews Proofs

Grid/lightbox with zoom; peritem comments (and timecode comments for
video).

Buyer Selects up to the package count (e.g., 12 edits).

If package includes no selection step (e.g., "deliver all 20"), skip to
Finals.

Publish Finals (seller)

For each selected item (or the whole set), upload Final proxies and
attach External Links to originals.

Mark items Final; system locks proof download (if enabled) and exposes
Final download links.

Add License terms chip (pulled from package preset) and Usage window if
applicable.

Acceptance Window starts

Default 7 days (configurable per package: 3/7/14 days).

Buyer can Accept all or specific items, or Request revision (counts
toward package revision rounds).

Autoaccept triggers when the window expires with no action.

UGC/Promo: acceptance occurs when post verifies (API or link) and
remains live for the minlive window (e.g., 72h) --- see §E.

Closeout

On Acceptance/Autoaccept, talent booking moves to Completed; payout
queues per §1.3/§3.1.

Leave a review prompt for both sides.

D\) Roles & Deliverable Types (what's supported v1)

Photographer / Videographer: proofs → selects (optional) → finals;
peritem comments, timecoded notes; revision rounds per package.

Model (as seller): usually no file delivery; deliverables are
Time/Service + signed Model Release (already in Smart Docs). Optional:
selfie IDmatch (phase 2).

UGC Creator / FanSubscription Creator (promo work): Post verification
deliverables:

Link to post + screenshot on publish; platform fetches post ID,
timestamp, initial metrics (where APIs allow).

System tracks minlive (e.g., 72h) + post window (e.g., 7 days).

Acceptance after minlive + verification (see §E).

Studio: no deliverables; checkin/out + docs + deposit flows instead.

E\) UGC/Promo Verification (Creators & FanSub Creators)

At delivery: seller submits link to the post (IG/YT/TT/X) + optional
screenshot.

Verification check (hourly during window):

Confirms post exists, is public, matches handle, and the timestamp ≥
booking delivery time.

Logs engagement metrics snapshot (ER proxy) where APIs permit (or
displays "unverified metrics" for linkonly).

Minlive enforcement: track continuous visibility for N hours (package
default 72h; configurable per deliverable).

Acceptance rule: autoaccept on passing verification + minlive, or manual
accept earlier by buyer.

Edge cases: post removed/hidden before minlive → seller can repost once
without restarting the entire acceptance window; noncompliance → buyer
may open refund request (policy per §3.9).

Safe Mode note: We neither fetch nor display 18+ media; SFW thumbnails
only; for FanSub Creators we record confirmation and metrics sans
explicit previews.

F\) AutoChecks & Evidence (objective validation)

On upload or link attach:

Technical:

Images: resolution (≥ target px), color space (sRGB/Adobe RGB), aspect
ratio, file type, filesize, EXIF presence.

Video: container/codec (MP4/H.264 or ProRes proxy), resolution, fps,
audio channels, duration.

Integrity: virus scan; checksum recorded (SHA256) for proofs/finals (and
for external manifests when possible).

Policy guards: NSFW detection warning (so sellers avoid borderline
public previews); SafeMode validation on previews.

Link checks: provider type (Drive/Dropbox/OneDrive/S3), reachability,
headers (size/type), and expiry status.

Evidence pack: autocollects manifest, checks, and timestamps; used in
disputes.

G\) Revisions & Comments

Revision rounds: default 1 round (configurable per package); seller can
grant extras inthread.

Peritem comments (images); timecoded comments (video); resolve state for
each comment.

Change requests must be actionable (UI enforces structured notes: crop,
color, retouch notes, timecode ranges).

Timers: buyer must submit revision request within the acceptance window;
seller SLA per package (e.g., 3 business days).

H\) Downloads & Watermarks

Proofs: watermarked, previewonly (download toggle off by default).

Finals: download links visible immediately on publish, or after
acceptance (package option).

External originals: always via provider's storage
(Drive/Dropbox/OneDrive/S3/S3 presigned); we never host originals.

Retention: onplatform proxies kept 90 days; manifests retained 12--24
months; banner clarifies "Not a backup service."

I\) Acceptance, Autoaccept & Payout Triggers

Acceptance window: default 7 days (3/7/14 options).

Manual Accept: buyer can accept itemlevel or whole batch; license
certificate issues instantly.

Autoaccept: when timer ends without open revision; licenses issue
automatically; payout queues.

Partial acceptance: allowed; payout apportions across accepted items if
package contracted peritem pricing; otherwise paid on batch acceptance.

UGC/Promo: acceptance on verify + minlive; payout scheduled afterwards.

Early Payout (peruse): eligible sellers (Rep ≥ 85) can accelerate
postacceptance.

J\) Disputes & NonDelivery

Missing deliverables (seller uploaded fewer than contracted): buyer
opens Refund Request; system compares contracted vs manifest; partial
refunds computed.

Quality disputes (offspec): rely on Autochecks + SOW to determine
deviation; may provide partial refund or revision credit.

Expired external links: seller must refresh within 48h of buyer notice;
timers pause during refresh grace; repeated expiry → reputation hit.

Escalation to Neutral Review (per §3.9): evidence pack includes
manifest, checks, comments, timestamps, link status, and SOW terms.

Studios: route to studio deposit/adjustment flows (no file disputes).

K\) Security, Privacy & Policy

Virus scanning on all uploads; block executables; safe MIME validation.

EXIF privacy: warn on personal EXIF; provide "strip on proxy" option.

DMCA & IP: report flow; lock downloads when claim is open; notify both
parties.

Safe Mode: only SFW previews visible publicly; buyer & seller see full
content subject to policy; FanSub flows avoid explicit previews.

L\) UI Details (components & states)

ManifestList with status chips: Proof • Final • Needs action • Error •
Link expired.

AutoCheckStatus: green/yellow/red with tooltips (e.g., "Video exceeds
4GB proxy limit; original link captured").

Comment sidebar (per item) with timecodes & resolve checkboxes.

Timer banner: shows Acceptance ends in Xd Xh; pauses if revision round
is open.

License chip on each Final; View License opens certificate modal (terms,
project, booking ID).

UGC tracker: "Verifying post..." → "Live ✓ (48/72h remaining)" →
"Verified ✓".

M\) Notifications & Emails

Seller: "Buyer selected X proofs" • "Revision requested on N items" •
"Acceptance complete"

Buyer: "Finals ready" • "Acceptance ends in 24h" • "UGC post failed
verification (reason)"

Both: "Autoaccept in 3h" • "Links expired---action required"

Emails respect Safe Mode (no explicit previews).

N\) Metrics

Time to first delivery, time to acceptance, % autoaccept, revision rate,
firstpass acceptance rate, link failure rate, nondelivery incidents,
refund rate, UGC verification pass rate, minlive compliance rate.

Feed Reputation inputs: ontime delivery, revision compliance,
nondelivery, link reliability.

O\) Telemetry (events)

delivery.batch.create/publish • delivery.item.add/remove •
delivery.link.attach/refresh/expire

autocheck.pass/warn/fail (reason) • virus.block

proofs.view • selects.add/remove • finals.publish

accept.open/accept.all/accept.some/auto_accept

revision.request/open/resolve (counts, per item)

ugc.verify.start/pass/fail • ugc.min_live.progress

refund_request.open/resolve (outcome)

license.certificate.view/download

P\) Acceptance Criteria (mark 4.8 FINAL)

Delivery Room supports Proofs → Selects (optional) → Finals with peritem
comments and timecoded notes for video.

External link manifest captured (name, size, type, checksum where
available, provider, URL); no original hosting; proxies/previews only.

Autochecks run on upload/link; results shown per item; virus scan
enforced.

Acceptance window (3/7/14 days) with Autoaccept; partial acceptance
supported; payout triggers wired.

UGC/Promo verification: link ingest, API checks when available, minlive
tracking, acceptance on verify+minlive.

Revisions: at least 1 round configurable; structured change requests;
timers pause during active revision.

Downloads & watermarks: proofs watermarked; finals downloadable per
package rule; retention & "not a backup" banner visible.

Disputes: nondelivery/quality/linkexpiry flows with evidence packs;
timers & outcomes integrate with §3.9.

Safe Mode & policy: SFW previews only; FanSub Creator flows avoid
explicit media.

Telemetry & metrics instrumented as listed.

Q\) Why this works

Reduces disputes: Objective manifests, autochecks, and acceptance timers
create shared reality.

Scales cheaply: Proxies + external links avoid massive storage costs
while preserving evidence.

Fits every role: Photographers/video get proofs→finals; creators get
verified posts; studios don't carry file baggage.

Clear payout triggers: Acceptance (or verified minlive) drives
completion; LBG clarity remains intact.

§4.9 --- Messaging & Threads --- FINAL

Goal: Provide a fast, safe, and actioncentric inbox where buyers,
talent, and studio hosts coordinate work. Threads must: (1) reduce
backandforth via Quick Actions (quote, reschedule, change order,
refunds), (2) keep evidence attached (docs, delivery, checkin/out), and
(3) respect our fairuse DM credits, Safe Mode, and offplatform payment
guardrails.

A\) Principles

Do work in the thread --- Quotes, schedule changes, docs, delivery,
adjustments, refunds are all firstclass actions.

Context everywhere --- Each thread shows role/space, booking status, and
key policy snippets.

Evidence over opinion --- Autoattach Smart Docs, Delivery manifests,
checkin/out, and price math.

Safe by default --- Hide personal contact info; scan attachments;
offplatform payment attempts are discouraged and throttled.

Low friction --- Replies are free; new conversation credits are the only
scarce resource (per §3.2).

LBGaware --- When Talent + Studio are booked together, keep threads
separate but coordinated, with Group Broadcast when needed.

B\) Thread Types & Routing

Inquiry thread (prebooking) --- starts from profile/search/brief invite.
Uses DM credit on the first outbound message only; replies are free.

Booking thread (Talent) --- created on acceptance/IB; status chips:
Booked → In progress → Delivered → Completed; shows escrow status.

Booking thread (Studio) --- created on acceptance/IB; shows access
details (masked until esign), deposit hold state, checkin/out status.

RFP thread --- buyer broadcast → provider reply; converts to
Inquiry/Booking on award.

LBG umbrella --- not a chat; a summary bar linking to the two booking
threads; supports Group Broadcast (see §I).

Routes: /messages (list) • /messages/{threadId} (detail) •
/messages?group={groupId} (shows both group threads with Broadcast
control)

C\) Layout (Thread Detail)

Header bar

Counterpart avatar & name • Role/Studio chip • City • Booking status
chip • Rep ring (0--100) mini • "View booking" • "View docs"

Rightside actions: Quick Quote / Change Order / Propose Reschedule /
Issue Refund / Get help (contextual, role/space aware)

Left (or main) pane

Message list (bubbles with timestamps, read receipts, link previews,
inline image/video previews with SafeMode filtering)

Pinned message (e.g., access code) shown atop until unpinned

Right (or drawer) pane

Summary card (dates, times, location neighborhood, price lines)

Docs (SOW, License, Release; Studio: Property/Space Release, House
Rules)

Delivery status (if talent thread)

Checkin/out (if studio thread)

Policies mini cards (cancel/refund window)

Group chip if part of LBG (tap to switch thread or use Broadcast)

D\) Composer & Message Types

Text (rich formatting minimal: bold, list, link)

Attachments: images, short clips (previewed), PDFs; virusscanned and
SafeMode filtered in public previews

Snippets/Templates: canned replies by role; perrole variables (price,
slots, packages)

Scheduling poll (propose 2--5 times)

Quick Quote (inline price proposal from package + addons → turns into a
booking when accepted)

Location picker (neighborhood only; exact studio address never sent
until docs signed)

Voice notes (Phase 2; text transcript required if enabled)

Emoji/ack (👍 etc.) to reduce noise

Credit logic:

Starting a new thread consumes 1 credit (per §3.2).

Replies, booking threads, and RFP replies do not consume credits.

If messages breach spam checks, sending slows or blocks (see §G).

E\) Pipeline, Automation & Reminders

Pipeline chips (auto): New • Needs Info • Quoted • Awarded • Booked •
Delivered • Completed

Autonudges (1/day max/thread) when: quote unanswered 48h, buyer hasn't
proposed times, docs unsigned, delivery unreviewed.

Snooze a thread (until date/time or after event).

Remind me later on action items (e.g., "Follow up on Tuesday").

F\) Quick Actions (contextual, policyaware)

Quick Quote (Inquiry → Booking)

Pick a package, adjust addons, travel, discounts; preview fee/takehome;
send quote.

Buyer taps Accept & Pay → goes to Talent checkout (or LBG if studio
already attached).

Propose Reschedule (Booking)

Propose new date/time (Talent or Studio); if LBG, system proposes
synchronized change to both bookings.

If only one can move, buyer picks: Split group or Change both later.

Change Order (Talent)

Add hours, addons, license tier changes; requote and reauthorize;
amended Smart Docs issued.

Issue Refund / Discount (Talent)

Partial refund or discount (policyaware); provider fee recalculates;
receipts reissued.

Studio: Share Access / Update Code

Access code (masked until both docs signed) • Parking/entry notes •
Backup contact.

Audit log for code reveals/updates.

Studio: PostBooking Adjustment

Overtime/crew overage/violation; attach photos/logs; opens adjustment
claim (per §3.9 timers).

Delivery: Request Acceptance / Request Revision

Inline buttons appear when the stage is appropriate.

Support: Get help

Opens contextual selfserve (refund, access issue, adjustment/dispute),
attaching evidence from the thread.

All actions produce system messages with links to receipts, docs, or
delivery items.

G\) Safety, Privacy & Abuse Controls

Autoredact obvious phone/email/payment handles prebooking; after
confirmation, allow a masked relay number/email (Phase 2) or keep inapp
only at v1.

Offplatform payment detection → inline reminder + link to Protection
benefits; repeat attempts throttle new thread creation.

Harassment & slur filter → soft block + "Report" affordance; P0 safety
escalations surface hotline.

Attachment guards → virus scan, MIME/type check, SafeMode preview
compliance; large files rejected with Delivery guidance.

Block/Mute other party; Report with categories (misrepresentation,
harassment, payment circumvention, explicit content).

Privacy: toggle Read receipts ON/OFF per user (default ON); Last seen
off by default.

H\) Inbox (List) & Search

Unified inbox with folders: All, Action needed, Booked, Archived.

Sort: Recent activity (default) • Unread first • By pipeline stage.

Filters: Role (if multirole), Studio (if host), City, Has booking, Has
docs pending, Has delivery pending.

Search within inbox: counterpart name, project title, booking ID.

Archive & Pin threads; archive autoreopens on new activity.

I\) LBGAware Collaboration

Group bar on talent or studio booking thread shows the partner booking
card with status and a "Broadcast to both" toggle.

Broadcast sends a message to both threads with a banner "Sent to both
bookings"; replies arrive in respective threads (kept separate for
policy/payout reasons).

Reschedules launched from either thread attempt to update both bookings;
system explains outcomes if only one can move.

Docs & delivery remain per booking; crosslinks appear in the group bar.

J\) Timezones, Localization & Calendars

All timestamps show local time for each user; hover reveals UTC and
other party's local time.

Date/time proposals include both parties' local times in the message
bubble.

ICS attachments created on booking and on accepted reschedules.

K\) Reliability & Performance

Optimistic send with retry; duplicate protection (idempotent keys).

Typing and read indicators; fall back gracefully on poor networks.

Attachment uploads show progress; resume on reconnect.

Message retention: durable; no hard expiry.

L\) Telemetry

inbox.view • thread.open • message.send
(type=text\|image\|pdf\|quote\|poll\|action) • message.read

quick_quote.open/send/accepted • reschedule.propose/accept/decline •
change_order.open/confirm

refund.issue • studio.access.share/update • adjustment.open/resolve

delivery.request_accept • delivery.request_revision

broadcast.send (group) • offplatform.detect • report.submit

dm_credit.consume/block • nudge.auto.sent

M\) Acceptance Criteria (mark 4.9 FINAL)

Thread types implemented (Inquiry, Booking---Talent/Studio, RFP) with
role/space context and status chips.

Composer supports text, attachments, templates, scheduling polls, Quick
Quote; SafeMode filtering for previews.

Quick Actions live and policyaware: Quick Quote, Propose Reschedule,
Change Order, Issue Refund/Discount, Studio Access, PostBooking
Adjustment.

LBGaware features: group bar, Broadcast, synchronized reschedules with
split option.

Read receipts, typing, pin, archive, inbox filters/search delivered; DM
credit spend only on first outbound of new threads.

Safety: offplatform detection, harassment filter, virus scan,
block/mute/report; personal contact hidden prebooking; access codes
masked until esign.

Evidence autoattached: docs, delivery links, checkin/out, receipts;
system messages for every action.

Time zone clarity in proposals and timestamps; ICS updated on
reschedule.

Performance: optimistic sends, retry, upload progress; telemetry fires
as listed.

N\) Why this works

Fewer support touches: The thread is a control panel---quotes,
reschedules, refunds, and adjustments live where the conversation
happens.

Safer & cleaner: Guardrails reduce fraud and harassment without blocking
legit coordination.

LBG clarity without confusion: Keep bookings separate for policy/payout,
yet coordinate via Group Broadcast and synchronized changes.

Frictionlight: Replies are free; credits only gate outbound cold
outreach, which protects buyers and keeps the inbox healthy.

§4.10 --- Reviews & Reputation UX

Goal: Make feedback trustworthy, fair, and hard to game---so buyers can
choose confidently and providers/hosts know what to improve. Keep
reviews rolescoped for People and spacescoped for Studios. Use a
transparent 0--100 Reputation Score that's explainable, timeweighted,
and tied to real outcomes (ontime delivery, noshow rate, safety).
Respect Safe Mode, privacy, and legal boundaries.

A\) Principles

Only from real jobs: Public star/text reviews come only from completed,
onplatform bookings (verified by escrow + acceptance).

Doubleblind & timeboxed: Neither side sees the other's review until both
submit or the window closes.

Role/space scoped: Reviews and reputation never mix across roles;
studios have their own reputation.

Evidence beats rhetoric: Where relevant, the UI shows objective signals
(checkin/out, delivery timestamps, UGC minlive pass).

Safety first: Provide a private safety feedback channel separate from
public reviews; enforce antiharassment and antidoxxing rules.

Explain the math: The Reputation Score always has a "Why this score?"
breakdown and decay timeline.

B\) Triggers & Windows

Trigger to review:

Talent bookings: on Acceptance or Autoaccept in Delivery Room.

Studios: at checkout complete (after checkout time passes and no open
access issue).

Window: 14 days from trigger for both parties.

Doubleblind: Reviews publish when both are submitted or at day 14; if
only one submits, both publish at day 14.

Reminders: Day 3, Day 10 nudges; Day13 last call (inapp + email).

Who can review: The buyer and the counterparty (provider or host). No
thirdparty public reviews.

Canceled jobs:

Provider/hostfault cancel: no star review; system records a reliability
penalty visible in the Rep breakdown.

Buyerfault cancel: same (penalty on buyer account; not public).

Noshow: no star review; a Noshow marker feeds reputation (decays).

C\) Review Composer (roleaware)

Common structure

Stars (1--5)

Short tags (2--3 chips)

Optional text (min 30 chars for 1--2★; 4--5★ can be empty)

Photo evidence (SFW only; optional; studios allow space photos; talent
allows BTS SFW)

Private safety feedback (structured, never public; see §H)

Rolespecific tags

Model/Creator: Professional • Punctual • Communication •
Posing/Direction • Boundaries respected • Would book again

Photographer: Direction • Professional • Communication • Turnaround met
• Quality of edits • Clear brief

Videographer: Professional • Audio quality • Color grade • Timely
delivery • Communication

UGC/FanSub Creator: Followed brief • Post verified • Met minlive •
Onbrand • Clear disclosure

Studio (space): Accurate listing • Easy access • Cleanliness • Noise
control • Natural light • Amenities as described

Guardrails

Disallow personal info (emails/phones), hate speech, harassment; inline
warnings with policy links.

Safe Mode ensures no explicit images can be attached.

D\) Display & Surfacing

On profiles (People)

Star average + count (shows only after ≥ 3 verified reviews)

Reputation Ring (0--100) with "Why this score?" → breakdown and recent
trend sparkline

Latest reviews (3--5), with Verified booking label; studio reviews never
appear here

Community references in a separate section (low weight, ownerapproved)

On Studio pages

Star average + count (threshold ≥ 3)

Studio Reputation Ring (spacescoped) with breakdown (reliability
includes deposit claim behavior)

Photo reviews encouraged (SFW), especially of space and amenities

In Search

Rep ring chip on cards; hover/tooltip with score reason

Filters: Min Reputation (0--100) and Min Stars (1--5)

Sort: Top Reputation, Rating, and Recent

E\) Reputation Score (0--100) --- computation (v1)

Weights (roleaware; spaceaware for studios)

Reviews & volume --- 40% (Bayesiansmoothed star mean; more weight with
more reviews; community references capped)

Reliability --- 25% (ontime completion, noshow rate, cancel fault,
dispute loss rate; deposit abuse for studios)

Responsiveness --- 10% (median first response time; response
consistency)

Verifications --- 15% (ID, Trusted Pro, Socialverified, Verified Studio)

Recent performance --- 10% (last 90 days weighted 2×)

Penalties & decay

Late cancellations/noshows/dispute losses apply sharp penalties that
decay over 60--120 days.

Smallsample protection: Bayesian prior (city/role baseline) prevents
"100 after 1 review."

Caps: Any single factor can affect at most ±12 points per month
(prevents sudden swings).

New accounts: show "New --- building reputation" until 3 verified
reviews or 10 completed bookings.

Transparency

"Why this score?" panel shows 5 bars and examples ("2 late cancellations
in last 90 days (--6)").

"How to improve" checklist (e.g., Enable Instant Book; verify ID; reply
faster; meet delivery SLA).

F\) Antigaming & Moderation

Ring detection: repeated mutual 5★ bursts across a tight user cluster
(IP/device/time overlap) → flag; reduce weight; investigate.

Incentivized reviews: explicit quidproquo offers ("5★ for discount") are
prohibited; detection via text patterns + reports.

Review gating: Providers/hosts cannot prompt reviews with incentives
inthread; system handles prompts neutrally.

One owner response per review; edits allowed for 15 minutes after
posting, then locked (typos only).

Flagging: "Report review" (harassment, personal info, hate, explicit
content, irrelevant, privacy breach).

Outofscope: We don't remove reviews for mere opinion or star rating;
removal is for policy violations only.

Anonymity options: Buyers can publish under brand/team name; personal
names are hidden by default.

G\) LBG (Linked Booking Group) behavior

One postbooking flow invites the buyer to review both bookings (Talent &
Studio) in a single step; each publishes to its own page.

Reviews remain independent; a studio's issues don't lower a
photographer's rating (and vice versa).

If one booking is canceled by fault, the other may still be reviewable
per its own rules.

H\) Safety Feedback (private, nonpublic)

Structured form in the review flow: boundary violations, harassment,
unsafe space, undisclosed cameras, access issues.

Feeds Safety Console with the booking context, checkin/out, docs, and
message snippets.

Not public; may trigger a strike, IB suppression, or verification
recheck; submitter receives outcome summary when resolved.

I\) Prompting & Emails (biasfree)

Neutral subject lines and copy ("Share feedback about your experience").

No starnudging language; no images that could bias; SFW only.

Onetap stars deeplink on mobile; text field optional except for 1--2★
(reason required).

Followup once if unreviewed; no further nags after day 14.

J\) Metrics & Health Targets

Review completion rate ≥ 55% (either side)

Doubleblind submissions ≥ 35% (both sides submitted before day 14)

1--2★ share within expected band (watch for chilling effects)

Disputeadjusted satisfaction (4★+ after successful support outcome)

Flag rate \< 2% of reviews; removal rate \< 0.4% (policy violations
only)

Rep score stability (stdev \< 6 points over 30 days for steady accounts)

Correlation: Rep vs conversion uplift (target positive, diminishing
returns past \~85)

K\) Telemetry

review.request.sent/open • review.submit (stars, role\|studio) •
review.publish

review.flag (reason) • review.owner_response.submit

rep.why.open • rep.improve.view/action

safety_feedback.submit (category)

lbg.review.bundle.start/complete

email.review.open/click (biassafe content)

L\) Acceptance Criteria (mark 4.10 FINAL)

Doubleblind reviews with a 14day window; publish when both submit or on
expiry.

Rolescoped reviews & reputation for People; spacescoped for Studios;
never mixed.

Composer includes stars, tags, optional text, SFW photos, and private
safety feedback.

Display: profiles/pages show star average (≥3 reviews), latest reviews,
Reputation Ring with transparent breakdown.

Reputation Score computed with weights (40/25/10/15/10), Bayesian
smoothing, penalties with decay, caps on monthtomonth swing, and "New"
state until minimum data.

Search integrates Rep ring chips, filters (Min Rep/Min Stars), and sort
options.

Antigaming rules enforced: ring detection, no incentives, policybased
removals only; owner reply limits.

LBG review bundle flow implemented; each review publishes to its own
entity.

Safe Mode respected: no explicit media in reviews; emails/push SFW.

Telemetry & KPIs instrumented as listed.

M\) Why this works

Trustworthy by design: Only verified bookings yield public reviews; the
rest factor into reliability quietly.

Explainable, not mysterious: The 0--100 score with a clear "why" builds
confidence and guides improvement.

Hard to game, easy to use: Doubleblind timing, smallsample smoothing,
and ring detection keep ratings honest; the UI stays friendly.

Aligns with search & conversions: Strong reputation helps sort ties
without letting paid boosts hijack results.

§4.11 --- Support, Refunds & Disputes UX

Goal: Resolve issues quickly, predictably, and fairly with minimal human
touch. Keep everything policyaware, evidencefirst, LBGaware (Talent +
Studio), and feeaccurate (per §3.1). Make outcomes clear before users
commit to a request, and autoassemble evidence (docs, checkin/out,
delivery manifests, deposit settings) to reduce friction and fraud.

A\) Principles

Do it where the work lives: All flows start in the booking thread via
Inthread ▸ Get help; no context loss.

Outcome clarity upfront: Show a refund/charge preview based on policy
matrix and timestamps before submission.

Evidence beats rhetoric: Autoattach Smart Docs, Delivery manifests,
checkin/out, calendar logs, studio access logs, and payment lines.

Separate ledgers: Talent and Studio bookings are independent; LBG shows
a single summary with perbooking outcomes.

Timers & SLAs: Access issues are P1; standard disputes follow strict
windows (24h/48h/5day).

Chargebackready: Every case builds a representment pack by default.

SFW & privacy: No explicit media; exact studio address hidden except to
parties; Safe Mode respected in notifications.

B\) Entry Points & Routes

Thread shortcut: Inthread ▸ Get help (contextual forms)

Profile menu: Support Center /support → lists bookings + cases

Booking detail: Open a case button

Admin: Support Console /admin/support (agentonly)

C\) Case Types (policyaware, minimal)

Talent bookings

Refund request -- cancellation (buyerinitiated; applies §3.9 talent
matrix)

Nondelivery / missing items (compare SOW vs manifest)

Offspec quality (autochecks vs SOW; may route to revision first)

Noshow / late arrival (uses checkin/out evidence)

Payment correction (duplicate charge, tax error)

Studio bookings

Access issue (live) → P1 (badge); resolves or refunds per §3.9 addendum

Damage claim (hostinitiated; deposit hold)

Postbooking adjustment (overtime, crew overage, rule violation)

Amenity misrepresentation (partial refund if material)

Payment correction

Linked Booking Group (LBG)

Group cancel/split (compute separate outcomes; show one summary)

Group reschedule (sync both bookings or split)

Mixed dispute (e.g., Talent deliverables issue + Studio OK)

D\) SelfServe Triage Wizard (all flows)

Step 1 --- Identify issue

Contextaware options (e.g., "Access code not working" on Studio;
"Delivered fewer images than contracted" on Talent).

Step 2 --- Policy preview

Show matrix snippet (e.g., "\>7d=100%, 7--48h=50%, \<48h=0%"), countdown
timers, and estimated outcomes (refund lines per booking, buyer fee
policy, deposit note).

If outcome is clearly \$0, offer "Contact seller/host" instead of
filing.

Step 3 --- Evidence (auto + user)

Autoattached: checkin/out (Studio), SOW/License/House Rules, Delivery
manifest, Autochecks, messages timeline, price lines, deposit
configuration, access logs (if integrated).

User prompts: upload photos/video (SFW), describe discrepancy; link to
UGC post when relevant.

Step 4 --- Review & submit

Show refund/charge preview with taxes/fees; LBG outcome split if group;
submit → case created.

Confirmation

Thread posts a system message summarizing the case; both parties get
actions (Respond / Add evidence).

E\) Evidence & Calculations (what the engine uses)

Talent: SOW (deliverables count/spec), Delivery manifest
(filenames/checksums), Autochecks (resolution, codecs), acceptance
timestamps, revision rounds used, messages referencing scope.

Studio: checkin/out geofence pass/fail, House Rules signatures, access
logs, pre/post photos, schedule vs booked, crew count note, hazard
toggles & Safety Addendum.

Financials: escrow amounts, provider fee, buyer fee, tax lines, deposit
authorization, promotions/discounts.

Outcome logic: applies matrices from §3.9; refund buyer fee only on
provider/hostfault or safety exceptions; deposit captures no platform
fee (per §3.1 addendum).

F\) Case Lifecycle & States

Open (awaiting counterparty) --- autodeadline set (48h respond).

Evidence needed --- requester must add missing items (48h).

Proposed resolution --- party has 48h to accept/decline.

Neutral Review --- agent evaluates evidence; target decision ≤ 5
business days.

Resolved --- refund/charge issued; receipts & amended docs generated.

Closed --- telemetry logged; affects Reputation and future eligibility
(IB/boosts).

Fastlane closures

Access failure (host fault) → immediate refund of Studio; buyer fee
waived; goodwill credit optional.

Talent providercancel → immediate buyer refund; buyer fee waived;
reputation penalty.

G\) Timers & SLAs (confirming §3.9 addendum)

Studio access (live): P1; first response ≤ 30 minutes.

Damage claim window (host): open ≤ 24h after checkout; buyer response
48h.

Adjustment window (studio): open ≤ 24h; buyer response 48h.

Nondelivery (talent): buyer opens within acceptance window or ≤ 7 days
post autoaccept; seller response 48h.

Neutral Review decision: ≤ 5 business days after evidence windows.

Deposit autorelease: 48h postcheckout if no claim.

User case detail

Timeline (events, deadlines), Outcome calculator panel, evidence list
(auto + uploaded), Proposed resolution, Accept/Decline buttons, messages
subthread.

Case list with SLA badges; filters; macros.

LBG outcome split view (Talent \| Studio) with oneclick apply of both.

Deposit actions (authorize/void/capture with amount + reason); evidence
viewer.

Sanctions (toggle IB off, suppress boosts, visibility throttle); strike
ladder shortcuts.

Representment kit export (PDF + evidence images/logs).

Templates: Access failure (host remedy/credit), Adjustment
approved/denied, Damage approved/denied, Talent nondelivery partial.

Fraud guard: repeated loss in disputes → IB off and promotion
suppression; investigation flag to Safety.

Chargebacks: we do not charge a dispute fee unless clear abuse;
otherwise platform absorbs processor fee.

Goal: Give buyers, sellers (talent), and studio hosts a clear,

Automated generation: system compiles annual earnings (gross), uses

L\) Security, Privacy & Compliance --- Expanded

PCI DSS: handled by processor; we store only tokens.

KYC/KYB: processorhosted flows (name, DOB, EIN, beneficial owners for

PII minimization: TINs and sensitive tax data encrypted at rest

Edelivery compliance: capture affirmative consent; provide online

Audit trail: tax engine calls (request/response summaries), tax lines

Data retention: retain W9 and 1099 records per federal/state

§4.13 --- Verification Center UX

Goal: Make verification fast, private, and explainable---so good actors
unlock trust and distribution quickly, while risky behavior is filtered
early. Centralize all checks in one Verification Center, with clear
benefits, transparent progress, firm privacy controls, and compliant
workflows (ID, background, social metrics, studio).

A\) Surfaces & Routes

Verification Center home: /verify (also topnav "Verify" badge if
incomplete).

Contextual nudges: in profile editor, Checkout (Instant Book gating),
Boost setup, Studio onboarding.

Admin console (Trust): /admin/verify queue with evidence, statuses,
audits.

B\) Verification Types & Badges (what users can earn)

ID Verified (Person) --- government ID + selfie liveness; unlocks
Instant Book, +20 DM credits, storage bump (to 30 GB), Verifiedonly
search filter eligibility.

Trusted Pro (Backgroundchecked) --- FCRAstyle consumer report; unlocks
--0.5% provider fee nudge (floor rules apply), Boost eligibility, search
nudge, storage bump to 50 GB.

SocialVerified --- connected IG/YT/TT/X with API metrics; enables
verified chips and perplatform filters in search (§1.2 addendum).

Studio Verified (Space) --- proof of control (lease/utility/biz doc) +
address validation + photos; shows Studio Verified badge and filter.

Phone & Email Verified --- base checks (SMS/OTP, email link) always
required for outbound messaging.

Optional Safety Aware (Phase 2) --- short safety module + quiz; soft
search nudge.

18+ only: All roles require dateofbirth confirmation; ID flow enforces
18+.

C\) Benefits, Gating & Incentives (consistent with §§1.5, 3.2, 3.3)

ID Verified: Instant Book on, +20 DM credits/month, storage 30 GB,
"Verifiedonly" buyer filter, mild ranking tiebreak.

Trusted Pro: fee nudge --0.5%, Boost eligibility, priority in RFP
queues, storage 50 GB.

SocialVerified: metric chips on cards/profile; eligibility for "Top in
Houston" showcases.

Studio Verified: appears in "Verified Studios" selector at checkout;
eligibility for Featured Studio carousel.

Boost eligibility: requires ID Verified + Rep ≥ 70 + no strikes (§3.3).

Founding city subsidies: autoapplied coupon for first N completions per
city (configurable; see §3.4).

D\) Person --- ID Verification Flow

Route: /verify/id → 4step wizard

About you --- legal name, DOB, country/state; explain "Your public
profile can use an alias; legal name is private."

Document capture --- front/back (DL/ID/Passport); autoOCR; MRZ when
available.

Selfie liveness --- short movement prompts; face match score presented
as "passed/needs review."

Review & consent --- purpose, retention policy, and submit.

UX states:

Instant result: Passed → badge applied immediately.

Needs review: manual review SLA ≤ 24 h; user can continue using
platform; IB remains gated until pass.

Fail: give concrete next steps (better lighting, correct doc type) and
allow 2 more attempts before manual review.

Privacy: Store only required vectors/metadata; no raw images shown to
other users; legal name never public unless user opts in.

E\) Person --- Background Check (Trusted Pro)

Route: /verify/background → compliant consent flow

Consent & disclosure: explain scope; this is not employment, but we
follow FCRAstyle notices.

PII capture: SSN (masked in UI), address history (5 years), legal name
variations.

Run checks: national/criminal sex offender, relevant county/state,
global sanctions (where legal), identity verification.

Results taxonomy: Clear, Review, Consider with reason codes.

Adverse action (riskmanaged):

Preadverse notice with report copy & dispute instructions.

7day response window (configurable); investigation pause.

Final decision recorded; detailed internal notes; user notified.

Policy highlights:

Disqualifying offenses scoped to platform safety (e.g., violent crimes,
stalking, trafficking).

Recency & rehabilitation considered (timeweighted); expunged/sealed
records ignored where required.

Recheck cadence: every 12 months or upon safety trigger.

Cost: passthrough pricing with foundingcity subsidies (§3.4); status
shows any coupon applied.

F\) Social Verification (metrics & badges)

Route: /verify/social

Connect Instagram/YouTube/TikTok/X via OAuth; request readonly insights
scopes; display exactly what we fetch.

Verified chips appear on profile/search cards (e.g., IG 182k • 2.8% ER,
"Verified via API").

Sync: nightly + manual refresh up to 3×/day (ratelimited); handles token
expiry gracefully.

Unlink: allowed; metrics fall back to selfreported (hidden by default
unless buyer toggles "include selfreported").

Manual verify path for large accounts if API unavailable (proof post,
domain verification, lightweight review).

FanSubscription Creators: supported as Creators; no explicit content
ingested; we verify the business account identity/metrics only (Safe
Mode).

G\) Studio Verification (space owners/hosts)

Route: /verify/studio/{studioId}

Ownership/control proof --- upload lease/utility/biz registration, names
must reasonably match host profile or company.

Address validation --- geocode + mail code optional; exact address stays
private until booking confirmation.

Space evidence --- frontage photo + interior set (SFW) + entrance
signage; EXIF timestamp hints accepted.

Rules & safety --- hazards toggles, House Rules review, emergency
contact.

Review & badge --- "Studio Verified" with verification date; reverify
every 12 months or on change.

What buyers see: Studio Verified badge, neighborhood (not exact
address), rules summary.

H\) Security & Safety Addons

Phone/email verified (required); 2FA optional (strongly recommended for
payout changes).

Trusted Contact (optional): can receive checkin/out timestamps and
generalarea location on active bookings.

Emergency PIN (Phase 2): inapp PIN sends silent alert to Safety with
live thread + booking IDs.

Device trust (Phase 2): flag new devices; email confirmation for
highrisk actions.

I\) Privacy, Data Minimization & User Controls

Data we keep (minimum): doc type, issuing country, last 4 of ID,
pass/fail tokens, facematch score bucket, verification timestamps.

What we don't keep: full ID number image beyond retention window; live
selfie video frames; background raw data beyond provider access window.

Retention: ID/Studio artifacts ≤ 30--90 days postdecision
(configurable); outcome + reference kept longer for audit.

Download my data: provide verification outcomes and submitted documents
(where lawful) upon request.

Alias vs legal: users may display an alias; legal name stays private
except on tax/legal docs.

J\) Admin Console (Trust) & Risk Engine

Queue: ID/Studio/Background/Social with SLA badges; prioritize "needs
review," highvalue sellers, foundingcity cohorts.

Detail view: sidebyside evidence, vendor decisions, facematch score, doc

Actions: approve/deny/require resubmission; redact PII; add internal
notes; trigger recheck; apply sanctions (IB off, Boost suppression).

Audit: immutable logs (who/when/what changed), reason codes, document
hashes.

Risk signals: velocity of failed attempts, device mismatch, suspicious
patterns → safety investigation flag.

K\) Notifications & Status

O\) Why this works

Low friction, high signal: Users see exactly why to verify and what they
get---conversiondriving perks rather than busywork.
